Title: Alexandria... Why?
Actors: Najla Fathi, Ahmad Zaki, Farid Shawqi, Mahmoud El-Meliguy
Plot: "Yahia", a young man living in the cosmopolitan Alexandria during World War II. Between his dreams, which up to Hollywood and constraints of his life in the middle class trying to be a new Hamlet to be or not to be . Uprising dreams wondering where all new meaning to life amid the horrors of war and life pain .
